## ✅ Governance Review Checklist

| Area                  | Reviewer Notes | Status |
|-----------------------|----------------|--------|
| **RBAC** – Are role-based permissions clearly defined and unchanged? |                | ☐ |
| **Session Privacy** – Do privacy settings remain transparent and enforceable? |                | ☐ |
| **Auditability** – Are logs retained and accessible for accountability? |                | ☐ |
| **Retention Policies** – Homework (30d), Audit Logs (90d), Archives (180d) still correct? |                | ☐ |
| **Student Transparency** – Is the consent banner aligned with POLICY.md? |                | ☐ |
| **README Link** – Does README point to POLICY.md for collaborators? |                | ☐ |
| **CODEOWNERS** – Are required reviewers assigned for POLICY.md changes? |                | ☐ |
| **Compliance** – Does the update align with civic/ethical standards? |                | ☐ |
